RelatedSentence: ADMINISTRATIVE GROUP : The International Association of Administrative Professionals ' Charleston chapter meets and holds its annual awards .
Export BASICS : The S.C. Department of Commerce , S.C. District Export Council and U.S. Commercial Service hold a workshop on exporting basics .
FOR JOB SEEKERs : Charleston County Public Library offers one - on - one help with online applications and a resume lab .
DEALING WITH THE MEDIA : The Greater Summervile / Dorchester County Chamber of Commerce 's tourism council holds a workshop : Best Practices for Communicating with the Media .
Hurricane Expo : Dorchester County Emergency Management Department holds a hurricane preparedness expo , 11 a.m .
Housing Summit : The South Carolina Community Loan Fund will hold a tri-county housing summit .
